snippet: Carl Bass, president and chief executive of Autodesk Inc., a software maker, says it is important to be clear about the direction a company is taking.
abstract: Adam Bryant Corner Office column features Autodesk Inc president and chief executive Carl Bass discussing his management technique. Photo (M)
lead_paragraph: This interview with Carl Bass, president and chief executive of Autodesk Inc. , a maker of 3-D design, engineering and entertainment software, was conducted and condensed by Adam Bryant. Q. Do you remember the first time you were somebody's boss?

headline.main: Never Swerve When Driving the Bus
